metadata.description: Card set code to drawer mapping for inventory management
instructions: Replace the example set codes with your actual Magic: The Gathering set codes
Update drawer names to match your physical storage locations
Add or remove entries as needed for your collection
Set codes should match exactly what appears in your ShipStation CSV files
common_set_codes: LTR - Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth
MB2 - March of the Machine: The Aftermath
CLB - Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
